contents:
WOULDN'T IT BE SO CONVENIENT TO HAS ALL PINCONGER ...

If so, the whole set up looks really huge.
The author, personally has resigned from pincong admin, which furthers neutrality.
The miwutong thing, is open-sourced. Though I personally cannot verify the code and credentials
, I can expect valid point from our community.
However, so far so good.
That said, I wouldn't guarantee the safety of all these. Safety over chitchat, afterall.
